issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: Fix new findbugs warnings in hadoop-yarn-resourcemanager and hadoop-yarn-applicationhistoryservice

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.summary: Findbugs warning in resourcemanager in branch-2.7 and branch-2.6

comments.body: Hi, can this move out of 2.6.3? Thanks!
Sure...Nobody has taken it up as well.
Ok. Move it to 2.6.4. Thanks Varun!

I'm thinking it's okay to add a section in findbugs-exclude.xml to fix the below warning.
{noformat}
<file classname='org.apache.hadoop.yarn.server.resourcemanager.scheduler.SchedulerApplicationAttempt'>
<BugInstance type='IS2_INCONSISTENT_SYNC' priority='Normal' category='MT_CORRECTNESS' message='Inconsistent 
{noformat}
In branch-2.7, there is a section to ignore the warning, added by YARN-2938.
I'll attach a patch for branch-2.6 shortly.
Remove it from 2.6.4 which is mostly for critical bug fix.
Attaching the same patch again to run tests on branch-2.7.

[~sjlee0], will we have a 2.6.6 release ?
If not, this need not go in branch-2.6

Committed to branch-2.7, branch-2.6
Thanks [~ajisakaa] for your contribution

It's unclear whether there will be 2.6.6, given that we don't have a clear EOL policy. I'll revive that discussion soon. In any case, I think it's OK to commit to branch-2.6 for now, which you've done. Thanks.

Had missed adding this JIRA to CHANGES.txt.
Have added the same.
